cu.explanation_en: Setting the local SCTP address to an unreachable IP (10.0.0.1) will cause binding failures and prevent the CU from establishing F1 connections.

du.explanation_en: Setting the local N address to the same as the remote N address (127.0.0.5) creates an IP conflict, leading to network interface binding issues and F1 connection failures.
du.explanation_zh: 將本地 N 地址設定為與遠端 N 地址相同 (127.0.0.5) 會造成 IP 衝突，導致網路介面綁定問題和 F1 連接失敗。
